com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class TreeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.TreeUtil

  • public final class TreeUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for navigating WComponent trees.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis, Jonathan Austin

    • Method Detail

      • collateVisibles

        public static List<ComponentWithContext> collateVisibles(WComponent comp)
        Obtains a list of components which are visible in the given tree. Repeated components will be returned multiple times, one for each row which they are visible in.
        Parameters:
        comp - the root component to search from.
        Returns:
        a list of components which are visible in the given context.

      • getRoot

        public static WComponent getRoot(UIContext uic,
                                 WComponent comp)
        Retrieves the root component of a WComponent hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        uic - the context to retrieve the root component for.
        comp - a component in the tree.
        Returns:
        the root of the tree.

        public static WComponent getComponentWithId(WComponent root,
                                            String id)
        Retrieves the component with the given Id.

        Searches visible and not visible components.

        Parameters:
        root - the root component to search from.
        id - the id to search for.
        Returns:
        the component with the given id, or null if not found.

      • isIdFocusable

        public static boolean isIdFocusable(WComponent root,
                                    String id)
        Check if this ID is focusable.

        Considered focusable if the component and all its ancestors are visible and not hidden.

        Parameters:
        root - the root component to search from.
        id - the id to search for.
        Returns:
        the component with context if it is focusable, otherwise null

      • traverse

        public static void traverse(WComponent node,
                            WComponentTreeVisitor visitor)
        General utility method to visit every WComponent in the tree, taking repeaters etc. into account.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to traverse.
        visitor - the visitor to notify as the tree is traversed.

      • traverseVisible

        public static void traverseVisible(WComponent node,
                                   WComponentTreeVisitor visitor)
        General utility method to visit every visible WComponent in the tree, taking repeaters etc. into account.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to traverse.
        visitor - the visitor to notify as the tree is traversed.

      • findWComponents

        public static ComponentWithContext[] findWComponents(WComponent component,
                                                     String[] path)
        Retrieves WComponents by their path in the WComponent tree.

        Paths are specified using class names, starting from the furthest ancestor. To reduce the path lengths, class names do not need to be fully-qualified. The path does not need to explicitly state intermediate components between components, and may include an index suffix to select a particular instance of a component in e.g. a repeater or a set of fields. Some example paths are shown below.

        Example paths.
        { "MyComponent" }
        Matches the first instance of MyComponent.
        { "MyComponent[0]" }
        Also matches the first instance of MyComponent.
        { "MyComponent[1]" }
        Matches the second instance of MyComponent.
        { "MyPanel", "MyComponent" }
        Matches the first instance of MyComponent which is nested anywhere under a MyPanel.
        { "MyApp", "MyPanel", "MyComponent" }
        Matches the first instance of MyComponent, nested within a MyPanel, which is in turn nested somewhere within a MyApp.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to search from.
        path - the path to the WComponent.
        Returns:
        the component matching the given path, or null if not found.

      • findWComponent

        public static ComponentWithContext findWComponent(WComponent component,
                                                  String[] path)
        Retrieves the first WComponent by its path in the WComponent tree. See findWComponents(WComponent, String[]) for a description of paths.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to search from.
        path - the path to the WComponent.
        Returns:
        the first component matching the given path, or null if not found.
